search.sql: select issue_id, issue_details, issue_date, page_number, snippet(pages_fts, -1, '', '', '...', 50) as snippet, bm25(pages_fts) AS rank from pages join pages_fts on pages.rowid=pages_fts.rowid where pages_fts match :query AND issue_date >= :start_date AND issue_date <= :end_date order by rank
